title: DISCONNECTING TIME AFTER OTHER HELP!!!!!
body:
this first started in my laptop, the game would keep disconnecting and I thought it was just the laptops had bugs so I bought a desktop and the problem continues, when I'm outside of league I want movies youtube video and the wifi is fine so it seems to be an issue with the sever or something, please help me I have been experiencing this issue for the past month.

thanks.

replies.body: If you're having that problem with multiple pc's on the same network, the main problem might just be that your network is having problems reaching *our* servers specifically. Most of the time when this happens it's because of some weird things happening on the ISP side, but let's go ahead and try some quick troubleshooting. Adjust some of your network settings using our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a reference and let me know if that's able to help at all.
